House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01838
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO CALL FOR A CONTITUTIONAL CONVENTION TO BE COMPOSED OF ELECTED DELEGATES FROM EACH PROVINCE AND HIGHLY URBANIZED CITIES, AND OF APPOINTED DELEGATES TO BE CHOSEN BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES UPON THE RECOMMENDATION OF AN ADVISORY COUNCIL TO PROPOSE AMENDMETNS AND/OR REVISION OF THE 1987 CONSTITUTION, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Calls for a Constitutional Convention which shall be composed of elected delegates from each province and highly urbanized cities, and of appointed delegates to be chosen by the President of the Republic of the Philippines upon the recommendation of an Advisory Council to propose amendments and/or revision of the 1987 Constitution.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LEACHON, DOY C.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
